title: Task Automation
description: Gulpify allows you to automate a variety of tasks such as Pug compilation, HTML minification, and much more.
benefit: Saves time and reduces manual work

title: Ease of Use
description: Gulpify provides a simple and intuitive interface for setting up and running tasks, making it accessible for developers of all levels.

title: Extensibility
description: Gulpify is easily extendable with a wide range of plugins, allowing you to tailor it to the specific needs of your project.

title: Performance
description: Gulpify is built on Node.js, which provides fast and efficient task execution, resulting in quicker build times.

title: Community Support
description: Gulpify has a large and active community of developers who contribute plugins, provide support, and share best practices.

title: Error Handling
description: Gulpify includes built-in error handling features that help you identify and resolve issues quickly, ensuring a smooth development process.
